description: A security profile defines a set of expected behaviors for devices in your account.

Name.markdownDescription:
The name for the behavior.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9:_-]+  
Update requires: No interruption

Metric.description: What is measured by the behavior.
Metric.markdownDescription:
What is measured by the behavior.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9:_-]+  
Update requires: No interruption

SuppressAlerts.description: Manage Detect alarm SNS notifications by setting behavior notification to on or suppressed. Detect will continue to performing device behavior evaluations. However, suppressed alarms wouldn't be forwarded for SNS notification.
SuppressAlerts.markdownDescription:
Manage Detect alarm SNS notifications by setting behavior notification to on or suppressed. Detect will continue to performing device behavior evaluations. However, suppressed alarms wouldn't be forwarded for SNS notification.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

Behavior.markdownDescription:
A security profile behavior.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ExportMetric.description: Flag to enable/disable metrics export for metric to be retained.
ExportMetric.markdownDescription:
Flag to enable/disable metrics export for metric to be retained.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

DimensionName.description: A unique identifier for the dimension.
DimensionName.markdownDescription:
A unique identifier for the dimension.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9:_-]+  
Update requires: No interruption

Operator.description: Defines how the dimensionValues of a dimension are interpreted.
Operator.markdownDescription:
Defines how the dimensionValues of a dimension are interpreted.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: IN | NOT_IN  
Update requires: No interruption

MetricDimension.markdownDescription:
The dimension of a metric.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

BehaviorCriteria.description: The criteria by which the behavior is determined to be normal.

ComparisonOperator.description: The operator that relates the thing measured (metric) to the criteria (containing a value or statisticalThreshold).
ComparisonOperator.markdownDescription:
The operator that relates the thing measured (metric) to the criteria (containing a value or statisticalThreshold).

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: less-than | less-than-equals | greater-than | greater-than-equals | in-cidr-set | not-in-cidr-set | in-port-set | not-in-port-set | in-set | not-in-set  
Update requires: No interruption

DurationSeconds.description: Use this to specify the time duration over which the behavior is evaluated.
DurationSeconds.markdownDescription:
Use this to specify the time duration over which the behavior is evaluated.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

ConsecutiveDatapointsToAlarm.description: If a device is in violation of the behavior for the specified number of consecutive datapoints, an alarm occurs. If not specified, the default is 1.
ConsecutiveDatapointsToAlarm.markdownDescription:
If a device is in violation of the behavior for the specified number of consecutive datapoints, an alarm occurs. If not specified, the default is 1.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

ConsecutiveDatapointsToClear.description: If an alarm has occurred and the offending device is no longer in violation of the behavior for the specified number of consecutive datapoints, the alarm is cleared. If not specified, the default is 1.
ConsecutiveDatapointsToClear.markdownDescription:
If an alarm has occurred and the offending device is no longer in violation of the behavior for the specified number of consecutive datapoints, the alarm is cleared. If not specified, the default is 1.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

BehaviorCriteria.markdownDescription:
The criteria by which the behavior is determined to be normal.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

MetricValue.description: The value to be compared with the metric.

Count.description: If the ComparisonOperator calls for a numeric value, use this to specify that (integer) numeric value to be compared with the metric.
Count.markdownDescription:
If the ComparisonOperator calls for a numeric value, use this to specify that (integer) numeric value to be compared with the metric.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

StatisticalThreshold.description: A statistical ranking (percentile) which indicates a threshold value by which a behavior is determined to be in compliance or in violation of the behavior.

Statistic.description: The percentile which resolves to a threshold value by which compliance with a behavior is determined

The percentile which resolves to a threshold value by which compliance with a behavior is determined

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: Average | p0 | p0.1 | p0.01 | p1 | p10 | p50 | p90 | p99 | p99.9 | p99.99 | p100  
Update requires: No interruption

StatisticalThreshold.markdownDescription:
A statistical ranking (percentile) which indicates a threshold value by which a behavior is determined to be in compliance or in violation of the behavior.
